bug.author: tomassabat
bug.summary: Cannot install kglib - no matching distribution found for tensorflow
bug.description: I can't get to install grakn-kglib. After I run "pip3 install grakn-kglib" (inside a new venv), I receive this error: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement tensorflow==1.11.0 (from grakn-kglib) (from versions: ) No matching distribution found for tensorflow==1.11.0 (from grakn-kglib) I'm running python 3.7.1.

comments.comment: It seems TensorFlow <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/17022>doesn't work with Python #3.7+</denchmark-link> yet, so it isn't available via pip for that version. Try using a flavour of Python 3.6 instead, that should work. Thanks for raising this!
